solution_line_template: There were {multiplier_first_day}*{people_second_day} = <<{multiplier_first_day}*{people_second_day}={people_first_day}>>{people_first_day} people at the counting station who were counted on the first day.
In the two days, {people_first_day}+{people_second_day} = <<{people_first_day}+{people_second_day}={total_people}>>{total_people} were counted at the station.
